member.name: T:vgt_saga_serialization.SagaJsonConverter
member.summary: Converter class used to differentiate between implemented types of the message body. Serializes and deserializes json to and from the targeted record structs.

member.name: M:vgt_saga_serialization.SagaJsonConverter.ReadJson(Newtonsoft.Json.JsonReader,System.Type,System.Object,Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializer)
member.summary: Deserializes json to targeted MessageBody

member.name: T:vgt_saga_serialization.Utils
member.summary: Util class for the SAGA messages serialization handling. Util offers deserialization and serialization of the JSON messages to the appropriate types of the messages. Uses custom JsonConverter.

member.name: M:vgt_saga_serialization.Utils.#ctor(NLog.Logger)
member.summary: Default constructor for the Utils class. Utils object specifies the appropriate logger for the operations.

member.name: M:vgt_saga_serialization.Utils.Deserialize(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Deserializes JSON written in bytes from the RabbitMQ to the Saga Message struct with targeted and appropriate MessageBody of the specified Type.
member.returns: null if invalid otherwise deserialized Saga Message

member.name: M:vgt_saga_serialization.Utils.Serialize(vgt_saga_serialization.Message)
member.summary: Serializes SAGA Message struct to a string JSON
